definitions.definition: An ordered formation of forwards , typically bending down, binding to one another with their arms, and pushing opponents shoulder to shoulder, in which each side aims to gain control of the ball; a scrum .
Dated form of scrimmage ( “ a rough fight ” ) .

main_definition: ( rugby ) An ordered formation of forwards , typically bending down, binding to one another with their arms, and pushing opponents shoulder to shoulder, in which each side aims to gain control of the ball; a scrum .
secondary_definitions: Dated form of scrimmage ( “ a rough fight ” ) .
